power.title: Acid Mire
power.fluff: You transform the ground beneath your enemies' feet to hellish slime that eats away at flesh and bone

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of caustic slime that lasts until the end of your next turn.
The zone is difficult terrain for all creatures.

A creature that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes acid damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. This increases by +5 if the creature is prone. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

A creature that falls prone in the zone takes acid damage equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. A creature also takes this damage if it is prone in the zone when it is pushed, pulled, or slid. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.
